Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Deck<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Deck<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Class of the cards.
    public class Deck<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a deck of generic cards.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Deck()
      Constructor that makes an empty deck.
      Deck​(java.util.Collection<T> cards)
      Constructor that makes a shuffled deck with the given cards.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(T card)
      Add a card on top of the stack of available cards.

      Return if the deck is drawable.

      Discard a card.

      Draw a card from the deck.

      Get available cards.

      Shuffle the deck of cards.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Constructor that makes an empty deck.

      • Deck

        public Deck​(java.util.Collection<T> cards)
        Constructor that makes a shuffled deck with the given cards.
        Parameters:
        cards - Cards used to initialize the deck.

    • Method Detail

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffle the deck of cards. The discarded cards are put in the stack of the available cards and it gets shuffled.

      • draw

        public T draw()
        Draw a card from the deck. If the stack of available cards is empty, the deck gets shuffled so that the discarded cards become available.
        Returns:
        Card drawn from the deck.

      • peek

        public T peek()
        Returns:
        The card on top of the deck, but doesn't remove it from the deck

      • discard

        public void discard​(T card)
        Discard a card. This card is added to the stack of discarded cards, and will become available when there are no available cards left (or when the deck is shuffled)
        Parameters:
        card - Card to be discarded.

      • add

        public void add​(T card)
        Add a card on top of the stack of available cards.
        Parameters:
        card - Card to be added.

      • getDiscarded

        public java.util.List<T> getDiscarded()
        Get the discarded cards.
        Returns:
        List of discarded cards.

      • getAvaible

        public java.util.List<T> getAvaible()
        Get available cards.
        Returns:
        The available cards.

      • canDraw

        public boolean canDraw()
        Return if the deck is drawable.
        Returns:
        True if it's possible to draw, false otherwise.
